description: Enterprise techniques used by MimiPenguin, ATT&CK software S0179 (v1.2)
name: MimiPenguin (S0179)

techniques.comment: [MimiPenguin](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0179) can use the `/maps` and `/mem` file to search for regex patterns and dump the process memory.(Citation: MimiPenguin GitHub May 2017)(Citation: Picus Labs Proc cump 2022)
